short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop using Twitter and go to a better place, Bluesky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly transition from Twitter/X to Bluesky with a single click!

This Chrome extension automatically redirects you from Twitter (or X) to Bluesky, streamlining your social media experience. Perfect for users looking to make the switch or split their time between platforms.

Key Features:
- Instant redirection from Twitter/X to Bluesky
- Works on all Twitter/X pages and subdomains
- No setup required - install and go!
- Respects your privacy - no data collection

Whether you're exploring Bluesky or making a permanent move, this extension ensures you never accidentally land on Twitter again. Save time and stay focused on the platform you prefer.
Transform your browsing habits effortlessly - get Twitter to Bluesky Redirect now!
